Name: Percentage of \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\ followed by \Request Payment\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of \Request Payment\ activities with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ out of all payment-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average number of \Request Payment\ activities in a month
Total \Request Payment\ done by \SYSTEM\
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Frequency of \Request Payment\ followed by \Payment Handled\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of \Request Payment\ in relation to all activities in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Ratio of \Request Payment\ over \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of \Request Payment\ made per year
Percentage of \Request Payment\ that are followed by \Payment Handled\ within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of \Request Payment\ in the most common process variant
Percentage of \Request Payment\ activities with an amount greater than the average claim amount
